abstract: Moscow's former mayor Yuri M Luzhkov says that he has been summoned for questioning in embezzlement investigation of the Bank of Moscow, which is suspected of illegally funneling money into his wife's personal accounts.
snippet: Yuri M. Luzhkov, Moscow’s former mayor, said Monday that he had been summoned for questioning in an embezzlement investigation of the Bank of Moscow.
lead_paragraph: Yuri M. Luzhkov, Moscow’s former mayor, said Monday that he had been summoned for questioning in an embezzlement investigation of the Bank of Moscow.

headline.seo: Ex-Mayor of Moscow Faces Embezzlement Inquiry
